attributes.action: Reverse any future decision to close the minor injury unit at Bodmin Hospital
attributes.background: The community of Bodmin need local government reassurance that they will be consulted on any decision made to close Bodmin MIU via a full, frank and transparent consultation. Cornwall Council’s cabinet are due to vote on setting up an ACO (or ACS) on 7th February with no public consultation evident

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on the local council, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

https://www.cornwall.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/petitions/
